original_text: The Roman soldiers' leader went to Paul and he took hold of him. He said to his men, ‘Tie two chains round the arms of this man.’ Then he asked the people in the crowd, ‘Who is this man and what has he done?’
korean_text: 이에 천부장이 가까이 가서 바울을 잡아 두 쇠사슬로 결박하라 명하고 그가 누구이며 그가 무슨 일을 하였느냐 물으니

sentences.original_text: The Roman soldiers' leader went to Paul
and he took hold of him
'Tie two chains round the arms of this man.'
sentences.korean_translation: '이 사람의 양팔에 사슬 두 개를 채워라.'

sentences.original_text: Then he asked the people in the crowd
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 군중 속 사람들에게 물었습니다
